cards.rules_text:
{1}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Bard creature token.
[i]Fateful Hour[/i] — As long as you have 5 or less life, whenever you would create a token, create that many plus one instead.
cards.artist: Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

cards.rules_text: Whenever Salacious B Crumb dies, clash with an opponent. If you win the clash, gain 1 life and return Salacious B Crumb to your hand. [i](Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)[/i]
cards.artist: Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

cards.rules_text:
When Dexter Jettster enters, create two Food tokens.
Whenever you gain life, creatures you control gain Absorb X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn. [i](If a source would deal damage to this creature, prevent X of that damage.)[/i]
cards.artist: Episode II: Attack of the Clones

cards.rules_text: [i]Radiance[/i] — {1}{W}, {T}: Target creature and each creature you control that shares a color with it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.artist: Episode IX: The Rise of Skywalker

cards.card_name: Figrin D'an, and the Modal Nodes
cards.rules_text:
When Figrin D'an enters, create two 1/1 white Bard creatures tokens.
Bands with other creature tokens. [i](Any creature tokens can attack in a band as long as at least one has “bands with other creature tokens.” Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two creature tokens you control, one of which has “bands with other creature tokens,” are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)[/i]

Lifelink
Rampage 2 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)[/i]

Lifelink
Forecast — {2}{W}, Reveal Turgle from your hand: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. [i](Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)[/i]
When Babu Frik enters, fateseal 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.)[/i]
cards.artist: Episode IX: The Rise of Skywalker

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {W}
{3}, {T}: Target creature gains frenzy 2 until end of turn. [i](Whenever that creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.)[/i]

Undaunted. [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)[/i]
When Maximillian Rebo enters, create a 1/1 white Bard creature token for each creature target opponent controls.
cards.artist: Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

cards.rules_text:
Destroy target tapped creature.
Cipher [i](Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Tap target creature.
Recover {1}{W} [i](When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)[/i]

Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Gravestorm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)[/i]
cards.artist: Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

cards.rules_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.
cards.artist: Episode II: Attack of the Clones
Star Wars Clone Wars TV Show

cards.rules_text: This deck combines obscure Star Wars characters with obscure Magic keywords. All of these keywords have their reminder text on the cards, but most can be tricky to take full advantage of. This deck's main game plan is to gain life and make creature tokens to beat your opponent.
